lines.text: Hello there, would you like to buy fresh broccoli?
You don't like broccoli? Well, I've never heard that before!
Welcome to the market. Can I help you find what you are looking for?
Pok√©mon? No, this is a food market. I don't think you eat those, do you?
Nice day, isn't it? Would you like to buy some bananas?
I'll have you know, bananas are brain food! That's why I'm so smart!
Hurry, hurry! Bargains galore at our store today!
Too expensive? Hah! It's a bargain compared to yesterday's price!
Hello, we have some lovely sweet apples just in today.
No, you can't taste-test them first!
